author: Video Advice
description:
Facebook engineers have reverse-engineered ancient knowledge. They know what modern science still avoids: that the human body transmits energy, sound, and even information — through the skin. And now, using that same forgotten science, they’ve built technology that lets a person hear through their skin. But where did this knowledge really come from… and how far will they take it?

title: The Ancient Knowledge Facebook Just Tapped Into…
